 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׂטַר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==side== (Egyptian Aramaic [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>A 5</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְטַר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סִטְרָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex, 134, of.</sup> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 62, 122</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***half***);-absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Dan.7.5|Dan 7:5]] (of beast in vision).
